CIPHER.0.cipherString: Much of what we see in America, what most people feel has been progress and good things, have been brought about by the existence of third parties.
CIPHER.0.question: Solve this aristocrat.

CIPHER.1.cipherString: We actually have a real community of people doing useful things.
CIPHER.1.question: Encode this sentence with the Porta cipher using the keyword charges.

CIPHER.2.cipherString: What God intended for you goes far beyond anything you can imagine.
CIPHER.2.question: Encode this sentence with the Porta cipher using the keyword clear.

CIPHER.3.cipherString: When I die, I hope they don't cremate me 'cuz I'll burn forever.
CIPHER.3.question: Encode this sentence with the Porta cipher using the keyword worry.

CIPHER.4.cipherString: I am an outside person; if I don't get outside, I get a little crazy.
CIPHER.4.question: Encode this sentence with the Porta cipher using the keyword julie.

CIPHER.5.cipherString: If everything isn't black and white, I say, 'Why the hell not?'
CIPHER.5.question: Encode this sentence with the Porta cipher using the keyword ethiopia.

CIPHER.6.cipherString: I don't want to be involved in endless media gossip.
CIPHER.6.question: Encode this sentence with the Porta cipher using the keyword finest.

CIPHER.7.cipherString: fashion,  n.  A despot whom the wise ridicule and obey.
CIPHER.7.question: Encode this sentence with the Porta cipher using the keyword example.

CIPHER.8.cipherString: Next to ingratitude, the most painful thing to bear is gratitude.
CIPHER.8.question: Encode this sentence with the Porta cipher using the keyword newer.

CIPHER.9.cipherString: I love winners when they cry, losers when they try.
CIPHER.9.question: Encode this sentence with the Porta cipher using the keyword andrews.

CIPHER.10.cipherString: But no one frees himself from being in love in three days.
CIPHER.10.question: Encode this sentence with the Porta cipher using the keyword mutual.

CIPHER.11.cipherString: Respect is one of the greatest expressions of love.
CIPHER.11.question: Encode this sentence with the Porta cipher using the keyword williams.

CIPHER.12.cipherString: Marriage is too interesting an experiment to be tried only once.
CIPHER.12.question: Encode this sentence with the Porta cipher using the keyword monitors.

CIPHER.13.cipherString: Now in my theater training I showed no aptitude at all.
CIPHER.13.question: Encode this sentence with the Porta cipher using the keyword approval.

CIPHER.14.cipherString: Love is just a word until someone comes along and gives it meaning.
CIPHER.14.question: Encode this sentence with the Porta cipher using the keyword chronic.

CIPHER.15.cipherString: The education of a man is never completed until he dies.
CIPHER.15.question: Encode this sentence with the Porta cipher using the keyword worker.
